Starters.name: Pepper Chicken
Starters.description: Spicy and succulent chicken pieces tossed in a flavorful pepper sauce.

Starters.name: Chicken Kabab
Starters.description: Tender chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled to perfection.

Starters.name: Chicken Wings
Starters.description: Crispy fried chicken wings coated in a tangy and spicy sauce.

Starters.name: Mutton Fry
Starters.description: Tender mutton pieces pan-fried with a mix of traditional spices.

Starters.name: Prawn Fry
Starters.description: Juicy prawns marinated and fried for a crispy and flavorful starter.

Gravies.name: Chicken Gravy
Gravies.description: A classic home-style chicken curry with a rich and savory gravy.

Gravies.name: Chicken Makhanwali
Gravies.description: A creamy and buttery chicken dish, famously known as Butter Chicken.

Gravies.name: Mutton Curry
Gravies.description: Tender mutton cooked in a spicy and aromatic gravy, perfect with rice or bread.

Gravies.name: Pork Vindaloo
Gravies.description: A fiery and tangy pork curry from Goa, with roots in Portuguese cuisine.

Main Course.name: Chicken Biryani
Main Course.description: A savory chicken and rice dish with layers of chicken, rice, and aromatics steamed together.

Main Course.name: Mutton Biryani
Main Course.description: A royal dish with beautifully spiced and fragrant layers of biryani rice centered with juicy, tender mutton.

Main Course.name: Chicken Fried Rice
Main Course.description: Classic fried rice with tender chicken pieces, vegetables, and a savory soy sauce blend.

Pizza.name: Chicken Pizza
Pizza.description: Classic pizza topped with seasoned chicken, mozzarella cheese, and a tangy tomato sauce.

Pizza.name: Margarita Pizza
Pizza.description: A simple and delicious pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.

Breads.name: Kerala Parota
Breads.description: A layered flatbread, originating from the Indian subcontinent, made from maida flour.

Breads.name: Chappati
Breads.description: A simple and soft unleavened flatbread made from whole wheat flour.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Mutton Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A family pack of our royal Mutton Biryani, served with raita and gravy.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Chicken Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A generous portion of our classic Chicken Biryani for the whole family.
